ifort   -mkl -O3 -DNDEBUG -O3 CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/constant.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/def.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/fileio.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/finiteDVR.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/math.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/potential.f90.o CMakeFiles/wDVR.dir/src/wDVR.f90.o  -o wDVR
